faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: BMEcat is the international XML standard for exchanging product catalogs in the electrical sector. ETIM 9.0 provides the classification taxonomy with over 5,500 product classes.
faq.a2: Metel ECP is the legacy fixed-width format used by Italian electrical distributors. Each row is exactly 80 characters with predefined column positions.
faq.q3: How accurate is the AI classification?
faq.a3: Our AI engine achieves over 90% accuracy thanks to the dual-expert ChromaDB + GPT-4 pipeline. The system improves over time by learning from your corrections.
faq.a4: You only pay for the number of articles (SKUs) you classify. Each plan has a yearly SKU limit. Unused SKUs do not roll over.
